name: Monopoly Millionaire Game
intro: P2E game built on the BNB Chain
introduce: Monopoly Millionaire Game is a marine-themed game that features activities such as island construction, cultivating, shooting, among others. It is an NFT P2E game built on the BNB Chain. It adopts a dual-token economic model. MMG is the in-game token and MMC is the governance token.
